description:
In this fascinating overview of a high-income business, you will discover the key steps to starting a six-figure internet marketing agency from the comfort of your own home.

Small, local businesses across the Country (and the World) are struggling because they don't know how to promote their business online. They just haven't kept up with the times!

But now, you can help them!

Your agency can offer small business marketing services like:

  • Website Design
  • Mobile Website Design
  • SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Facebook Ad Campaign Management
  • Google Ad Campaign Management
  • Yahoo / Bing Ad Campaign Management
  • Reputation Management

and the best thing is, you can outsource the services you choose to offer to skilled, technical talent!

Small business owners are seeking your help and you can offer them these great services - but you don't have to do the services yourself.

I'll show you how and where to find these quality people that you can add to your team and I'll show you the specific (and best) ways to find them and hire them for your business.

Enroll in this course today and as an added bonus, you will receive my eBook titled:

"Offline Spy"

Offline Spy contains 67 pages of real-world offline marketing details - complete case studies which show you:

  • How we found each client
  • What we proposed to each client
  • How much we got paid by each client
  • How we landed each client
  • What we did for each client

Along with this detailed "spy" information, you will also benefit from "Real World Business Tips" sprinkled throughout the document.

Here's an actual review of the eBook alone:

“In one word - AMAZING!

Dave has gone and truly OPENED UP THE VAULT! The absolute MINIMUM this ebook should be sold for is $97, with no exaggeration...

You are getting the absolute most cutting edge war stories from someone who is slugging it out in the trenches...

Get this ebook and pay whatever pittance Dave is willing to give it away for, before someone throws cold water on his face and he wakes up!”

- docmatt

AND,

You also get THREE sample proposals - actual proposals I used and presented to small business clients so you can model these when you create your proposals.

Your enrollment is backed by Udemy's 30-day money back guarantee, so you have nothing to lose.

Enroll today and get the video course, bonus resources, Offline Spy eBook and 3 Sample Proposals - all guaranteed!
title: How To Do Internet Marketing Consulting For Small Businesses
